channel.title: [Framework] Lynx [By Q++]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i32.tinypic.com/65pfnp.jpg[/img][/center] [b]Introduction[/b] Well I'm Ervis/Q++ and i'm 14 i've played rsps since i was 10 and well i loved them and been playing and exploring them since then i've always wanted to make my own and get players. I've seen alot of servers but there owners just want money. I wan't to make a non profitable rsps so i can enjoy the server and others can to. I'm hoping to write my own framework the way i understand it and hopefully release it oneday. [b] Why would this be completed?[/b] Since ive chosen Electric Engineering & ICT as a GCSE Course i've decided to chooce rsps as practise and learning so i'm wanting to improve ALOT in java and other stuff.
[b]What I'm currently Doing?[/b] [07/07/2010] Reading Apache MINA Documentation.
[b]Thankfull List[/b]
[ul][li]Ecstasy (Helping me start off and explaining)[/li] [li]Mergim (Making me determined to finish of a project)[/li] [li]Anthony (Helpfull information)[/li][/ul]
Support Banners: http://i32.tinypic.com/15oxb7m.png [Light Theme] http://i32.tinypic.com/65pfnp.jpg [Dark Theme]

item.title: [Framework] Lynx [By Q++]
item.dc:creator: @Poridge Poridge
item.description:
@Poridge wrote:

(Anthony):

Raw NIO is more fun but it probably won’t end up more efficient than netty but it’s a learning experience.

I was told netty is better but yeah.

MINA is kinda slow, bulky, etc.[/quote]

Yeah i was looking at netty i’ll try raw nio

item.description:
@Poridge wrote:

[center][/center]
Introduction
Well I’m Ervis/Q++ and i’m 14 i’ve played rsps since i was 10 and well i loved them and been playing and exploring them since then i’ve always wanted to make my own and get players.
I’ve seen alot of servers but there owners just want money.
I wan’t to make a non profitable rsps so i can enjoy the server and others can to.
I’m hoping to write my own framework the way i understand it and hopefully release it oneday.

Why would this be completed?
Since ive chosen Electric Engineering & ICT as a GCSE Course i’ve decided to chooce rsps as practise and learning so i’m wanting to improve ALOT in java and other stuff.

What I’m currently Doing?
[07/07/2010] Reading Apache MINA Documentation.
